summary: Oliveiro is a young poet living in Buenos Aires where sometimes he has to sell his ideas to an advertising agency to make a living or exchange his poems for a steak. In Montevideo, he meets... See full summary »
cast: Darío Grandinetti|Sandra Ballesteros|Nacha Guevara|André Mélançon|Jean Pierre Reguerraz|Mónica Galán|Inés Vernengo|Marisa Aguilera|Hugo Arana|Mariana Baranchuk|Claudia Bedacarratz|Mario Benedetti|Jesús Berenguer|Pablo Brichta|Silvina Chaine|Marcela Criquet|Dalila|Jorge Del Castilo|Jorge Dória|Leonor Evelson|Diana Farias|Zacarias Ferrarotti|José Luis García Espina|Luis Gianneo|Carlos Gorriarena|Delfina Grau|Tito Haas|Lara Jadur|Pablo Jadur|Natalia Jefimczuk|Jorge Lanata|Diego Leske|Grecia Levy|Juan Leyrado|Marta Machado|Karina Meroni|Mora Moglia|Miriam Moyano|Santiago Mugnani|Helena Nessi|Miriam Odorico|Cecilia Ortelli|Graciela Pascual|Adriana Pérez|María Laura Reigosa|Carmen Renard|Paco Rey|Ana Rossi|Chela Ruíz|María Elena Sagrera|Salvador Sammaritano|Violeta Scarponi|Adriana Schettini|Miguel Ángel Solá|Walter Soubrie|Santiago Subiela|Ezequiel Tabarex|Ernesto Torchia|Jackie Tyrrell|Déborah Vidret|Elvira Villarino|Néstor Zacco|Carlos Broggi
title: El lado oscuro del corazón
